sections.heading: to 53-80. - Theft from the person
sections.text: Theft of motor vehicle, bicycle or livestock. Shoplifting. Theft, counterfeiting or embezzlement of passage tickets. Receiving stolen goods. Robbery, burglary, breaking and entering, generally. Use of explosives.Section 53-80a. - Manufacture of bombs.Section 53-81

sections.heading: Manufacture of bombs.
sections.text: Manufacture of bombs.

sections.heading: to 53-129. - Wilful injury to private building
sections.text: Damage to materials of construction project. Arson, generally. Illegal burning and dumping. Injury to or obstruction of railroads or navigation. Trespass, generally. Other offenses.

sections.heading: Unlawful alteration or disposal of rental electric storage batteries.

sections.heading: Possession of outboard motor having defaced factory or engine number.
sections.text: Possession of outboard motor having defaced factory or engine number.

sections.heading: to 53-142. - Unlawful appropriation of electric current
sections.text: Fraudulent diversion or use of water. Defrauding gas companies or public hospitals. Unauthorized performance of certain compositions. Tapping telegraph or telephone wires. Unlawful sale of railroad tickets. Unlawful gait of animals on bridges.

sections.text: Illegal sale or possession of master car key.

sections.heading: Transferral, sale or use of records, tapes, film, cassettes or discs without owner's consent, or supplying machinery for reproduction thereof, prohibited
sections.text: Exceptions.

sections.heading: Manufacture, sale or distribution of records, tapes, cassettes or discs without identification marks prohibited.
sections.text: Manufacture, sale or distribution of records, tapes, cassettes or discs without identification marks prohibited.

sections.heading: (Formerly Sec. 53-142e). - Destruction, delay or opening of letters and packages by private messenger or courier service prohibited.
